00049 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 // Function: ProgramEntityItem()
00051 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 ProgramEntityItem::ProgramEntityItem(QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00053                                      QString const& instanceName,
00054                                      QString const& displayName,
00055                                      QString const& description,
00056                                      QMap<QString, QString> const& configurableElementValues)
00057     : SWComponentItem(QRectF(-WIDTH / 2, 0, WIDTH, TOP_MARGIN + BOTTOM_MARGIN),
00058                       component, instanceName, displayName, description, configurableElementValues),
00059       endpointStack_(0), appPlaceholder_(0), appItem_(0), importedIcon_(0), fixed_(false)
00060 {
00061     // Set basic graphics properties.
00062     setFlag(ItemIsMovable);
00063     setFlag(ItemSendsGeometryChanges);
00064     setFlag(ItemIsSelectable);
00065     
00066     // Create the application placeholder item.
00067     appPlaceholder_ = new AppPlaceholderItem(this);
00068     appPlaceholder_->setPos(0, 40);
00069 
00070     // Create the endpoint stack.
00071     endpointStack_ = new EndpointStack(this);
00072     connect(endpointStack_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00073 
00074     endpointStack_->setPos(0, TOP_MARGIN);
00075 
00076     if (componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
00077     {
00078         endpointStack_->setEditable(false);
00079     }
00080 
00081     // Load the existing endpoints from the component.
00082     QMap< QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> > const& endpointDefinitions =
00083         componentModel()->getModel()->getModelParameters();
00084 
00085     QMapIterator< QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> > curEndpointDef(endpointDefinitions);
00086 
00087     while (curEndpointDef.hasNext())
00088     {
00089         QSharedPointer<ModelParameter const> endpointDef = *curEndpointDef.next();
00090 
00091         MCAPIDataType type = MCAPI_TYPE_MESSAGE;
00092                 stringToValue(endpointDef->getDataType(), type);
00093 
00094         MCAPIEndpointDirection dir = MCAPI_ENDPOINT_IN;
00095         stringToValue(endpointDef->getValue(), dir);
00096 
00097         endpointStack_->addEndpoint(endpointDef->getName(), dir, type);
00098     }
00099 
00100     // Determine the correct height for the node.
00101     onEndpointStackChange(endpointStack_->getVisibleHeight());
00102     connect(endpointStack_, SIGNAL(visibleHeightChanged(int)), this, SLOT(onEndpointStackChange(int)));
00103 
00104     updateComponent();
00105 }

00114 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 // Function: getContentMatcher()
00116 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 QSharedPointer<MCAPIContentMatcher> ProgramEntityItem::getContentMatcher() const
00118 {
00119     // Fill the matcher with current information.
00120     QSharedPointer<MCAPIContentMatcher> matcher(new MCAPIContentMatcher());
00121 
00122     // Set local node name and add endpoints.
00123     matcher->setLocalNodeName(name().toUpper());
00124 
00125     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, endpointStack_->getEndpoints())
00126     {
00127         matcher->addEndpoint(endpoint->getName(), endpoint->getMCAPIDirection(),
00128                              name().toUpper(), endpoint->getName().toUpper() + "_PORT_ID");
00129 
00130         // If the endpoint has a connection, add the remote endpoint
00131         // and the actual connection to the content matcher.
00132         if (endpoint->isConnected())
00133         {
00134             // Determine the remote endpoint item.
00135             EndpointItem* remoteEndpoint = endpoint->getConnections().first()->getEndpoint2();
00136 
00137             if (remoteEndpoint == endpoint)
00138             {
00139                 remoteEndpoint = endpoint->getConnections().first()->getEndpoint1();
00140             }
00141             
00142             matcher->addEndpoint(remoteEndpoint->getName(), remoteEndpoint->getMCAPIDirection(),
00143                                  remoteEndpoint->getParentProgramEntity()->name().toUpper(),
00144                                  remoteEndpoint->getName().toUpper() + "_PORT_ID");
00145             matcher->addConnection(endpoint->getName(), remoteEndpoint->getName(),
00146                                    endpoint->getConnectionType());
00147         }
00148     }
00149 
00150     return matcher;
00151 }

00161 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00163 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00164 void ProgramEntityItem::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00165 {
00166     QGraphicsRectItem::mousePressEvent(event);
00167     setZValue(1001.0);
00168 
00169     oldPos_ = pos();
00170 
00171     // Begin the position update for the connections.
00172     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, getEndpoints())
00173     {
00174         foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, endpoint->getConnections())
00175         {
00176             if (!conns_.contains(conn))
00177             {
00178                 conn->beginUpdatePosition();
00179                 conns_.insert(conn);
00180             }
00181         }
00182     }
00183 }

00185 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00186 // Function: mouseMoveEvent()
00187 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00188 void ProgramEntityItem::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00189 {
00190     // Discard mouse move if the diagram is protected.
00191     if (static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->isProtected())
00192     {
00193         return;
00194     }
00195 
00196     QGraphicsItem::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00197     setZValue(1001.0);
00198 
00199     if (getMappingComponent() != 0)
00200     {
00201         getMappingComponent()->onMoveItem(this);
00202     }
00203 }
00204 
00205 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00206 // Function: mouseReleaseEvent()
00207 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 void ProgramEntityItem::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00209 {
00210     QGraphicsItem::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00211     setZValue(0.0);
00212 
00213     if (getMappingComponent() != 0)
00214     {
00215         getMappingComponent()->onReleaseItem(this);
00216 
00217         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd;
00218 
00219         if (scenePos() != oldPos_)
00220         {
00221             cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new ProgramEntityMoveCommand(this, oldPos_));
00222         }
00223         else
00224         {
00225             cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new QUndoCommand());
00226         }
00227 
00228         // End the position update for the interconnections.
00229         foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, conns_)
00230         {
00231             conn->endUpdatePosition(cmd.data());
00232         }
00233 
00234         conns_.clear();
00235 
00236         // Add the undo command to the edit stack only if it has at least some real changes.
00237         if (cmd->childCount() > 0 || pos() != oldPos_)
00238         {
00239             static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd, false);
00240         }
00241     }
00242 }

00252 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00253 // Function: onEndpointStackChange()
00254 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255 void ProgramEntityItem::onEndpointStackChange(int height)
00256 {
00257     if (fixed_)
00258     {
00259         endpointStack_->setPos(0.0f, FIXED_TOP_MARGIN);
00260         setRect(-WIDTH / 2, 0, WIDTH, FIXED_TOP_MARGIN + height + BOTTOM_MARGIN);
00261     }
00262     else
00263     {
00264         endpointStack_->setPos(0.0f, TOP_MARGIN);
00265         setRect(-WIDTH / 2, 0, WIDTH, TOP_MARGIN + height + BOTTOM_MARGIN);
00266     }
00267 
00268     if (getMappingComponent() != 0)
00269     {
00270         getMappingComponent()->updateSize();
00271     }
00272 }

00274 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00275 // Function: createSource()
00276 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00277 void ProgramEntityItem::createSource(QString const& filename)
00278 {
00279     // Open the file for writing.
00280     QFile file(filename);
00281 
00282     if (!file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly | QIODevice::Text))
00283     {
00284         return;
00285     }
00286 
00287     // Create the indentation string.
00288     QString indent = createIndentString();
00289 
00290     // Start writing the file.
00291     QTextStream stream(&file);
00292 
00293     // Write the file header comment.
00294     stream << "/*!\n"
00295               " *  File: " + QFileInfo(filename).fileName() + "\n"
00296               " *\n"
00297               " *  Application code for " + name() + ".\n"
00298               " */" << endl << endl;
00299 
00300     // Write the #includes.
00301     stream << "#include <stdlib.h>" << endl;
00302     stream << "#include <stdio.h>" << endl;
00303     stream << "#include <mcapi.h>" << endl << endl;
00304 
00305     // Write the Kactus 2 generated MCAPI code.
00306     generateCode(stream, indent);
00307 
00308     // Write the main() function.
00309     stream << "int main(int argc, char* argv[])" << endl << "{" << endl
00310            << indent << "// Initialize the MCAPI." << endl
00311            << indent << "if (initializeMCAPI() != 0)" << endl
00312            << indent << "{" << endl
00313            << indent << indent << "// TODO: Write error handling code." << endl
00314            << indent << indent << "return EXIT_FAILURE;" << endl
00315            << indent << "}" << endl << endl
00316            << indent << "// TODO: Write your application code here." << endl << endl
00317            << indent << "// Finalize MCAPI before exiting." << endl
00318            << indent << "mcapi_finalize(&status);" << endl
00319            << indent << "return EXIT_SUCCESS;" << endl << "}" << endl;
00320 
00321     file.close();
00322 }

00324 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00325 // Function: generateCode()
00326 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00327 void ProgramEntityItem::generateCode(QTextStream& stream, QString const& indent)
00328 {
00329     // Retrieve the list of connected remote nodes and endpoints.
00330     QList<ProgramEntityItem*> remoteNodes;
00331     QList<EndpointItem*> remoteEndpoints;
00332 
00333     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, endpointStack_->getEndpoints())
00334     {
00335         if (endpoint->isConnected())
00336         {
00337             // Determine the remote endpoint item.
00338             EndpointItem* remoteEndpoint = endpoint->getConnections().first()->getEndpoint2();
00339 
00340             if (remoteEndpoint == endpoint)
00341             {
00342                 remoteEndpoint = endpoint->getConnections().first()->getEndpoint1();
00343             }
00344 
00345             remoteEndpoints.append(remoteEndpoint);
00346 
00347             if (!remoteNodes.contains(remoteEndpoint->getParentProgramEntity()))
00348             {
00349                 remoteNodes.append(remoteEndpoint->getParentProgramEntity());
00350             }
00351         }
00352     }
00353 
00354     // Write the Kactus 2 generated code.
00355     stream << "//-----------------------------------------------" << endl
00356            << "// Kactus 2 generated code begin - do not modify!" << endl << endl;
00357 
00358     // Write the node local node ids.
00359     stream << "// Local node ID." << endl
00360            << "const mcapi_node_t " << name().toUpper() << " = " << getMappingComponent()->getID() << ";" << endl << endl;
00361 
00362     // Write the remote node IDs.
00363     stream << "// Remote node IDs." << endl;
00364 
00365     foreach (ProgramEntityItem* node, remoteNodes)
00366     {
00367         stream << "const mcapi_node_t " << node->name().toUpper()
00368                << " = " << node->getMappingComponent()->getID() << ";" << endl;
00369     }
00370 
00371     // Write the local port IDs.
00372     stream << endl << "// Local port IDs." << endl;
00373 
00374     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, endpointStack_->getEndpoints())
00375     {
00376         stream << "const mcapi_port_t " << endpoint->getName().toUpper()
00377             << "_PORT_ID = " << endpoint->getPortID() << ";" << endl;
00378     }
00379 
00380     // Write the remote port IDs.
00381     stream << endl << "// Remote port IDs." << endl;
00382 
00383     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, remoteEndpoints)
00384     {
00385         stream << "const mcapi_port_t " << endpoint->getName().toUpper()
00386             << "_PORT_ID = " << endpoint->getPortID() << ";" << endl;
00387     }
00388 
00389     // Write the local endpoint variables.
00390     stream << endl << "// Local endpoints." << endl;
00391 
00392     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, endpointStack_->getEndpoints())
00393     {
00394         stream << "mcapi_endpoint_t " << endpoint->getName() << ";" << endl;
00395     }
00396 
00397     // Write the remote endpoint variables.
00398     stream << endl << "// Remote endpoints." << endl;
00399 
00400     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, remoteEndpoints)
00401     {
00402         stream << "mcapi_endpoint_t " << endpoint->getName() << ";" << endl;
00403     }
00404 
00405     // Write the other variables.
00406     stream << endl << "// Other variables." << endl
00407            << "mcapi_status_t status;" << endl << endl;
00408 
00409     // Write the initialization function.
00410     stream << "// Initializes the MCAPI system and endpoints." << endl
00411            << "// Returns zero if successful. In case of an error -1 is returned." << endl
00412            << "int initializeMCAPI()" << endl << "{" << endl
00413            << indent << "mcapi_version_t version;" << endl << endl
00414            << indent << "// Initialize the MCAPI implementation." << endl
00415            << indent << "mcapi_initialize(" << name().toUpper() << ", &version, &status);" << endl << endl
00416            << indent << "if (status != MCAPI_SUCCESS)" << endl
00417            << indent << "{" << endl << indent << indent << "return -1;" << endl
00418            << indent << "}" << endl << endl;
00419 
00420     // Write function calls to create local endpoints.
00421     stream << indent << "// Create local endpoints." << endl;
00422 
00423     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, endpointStack_->getEndpoints())
00424     {
00425         stream << indent << endpoint->getName() << " = mcapi_create_endpoint("
00426                << endpoint->getName().toUpper() << "_PORT_ID, &status);" << endl << endl
00427                << indent << "if (status != MCAPI_SUCCESS)" << endl
00428                << indent << "{" << endl << indent << indent << "return -1;" << endl
00429                << indent << "}" << endl << endl;
00430     }
00431 
00432     // Write function call to retrieve remote endpoints.
00433     stream << indent << "// Retrieve remote endpoints." << endl;
00434 
00435     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, remoteEndpoints)
00436     {
00437         stream << indent << endpoint->getName() << " = mcapi_get_endpoint("
00438                << endpoint->getParentProgramEntity()->name().toUpper()
00439                << ", " << endpoint->getName().toUpper() << "_PORT_ID, &status);" << endl << endl
00440                << indent << "if (status != MCAPI_SUCCESS)" << endl
00441                << indent << "{" << endl << indent << indent << "return -1;" << endl
00442                << indent << "}" << endl << endl;
00443     }
00444 
00445     stream << indent << "return 0;" << endl
00446            << "}" << endl << endl;
00447 
00448     stream << "// Kactus 2 generated code end" << endl
00449            << "//-----------------------------------------------" << endl << endl;
00450 }

00452 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00453 // Function: indent()
00454 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00455 QString ProgramEntityItem::createIndentString()
00456 {
00457     QSettings settings;
00458 
00459     // Read indentation settings.
00460     MCAPITextEdit::IndentStyle style =
00461         static_cast<MCAPITextEdit::IndentStyle>(settings.value("editor/indentStyle",
00462                                                                MCAPITextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_SPACES).toInt());
00463     unsigned int width = settings.value("editor/indentWidth", 4).toInt();
00464 
00465     QString indent;
00466 
00467     if (style == MCAPITextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_SPACES)
00468     {
00469         indent.fill(' ', width);
00470     }
00471     else
00472     {
00473         indent = "\t";
00474     }
00475 
00476     return indent;
00477 }

00479 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00480 // Function: setApplication()
00481 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00482 void ProgramEntityItem::setApplication(ApplicationItem* item)
00483 {
00484     // Disable application if the underlying mapping component is not a CPU.
00485     if (!getMappingComponent()->componentModel()->isCpu())
00486     {
00487         return;
00488     }
00489 
00490     appItem_ = item;
00491 
00492     if (appItem_ != 0)
00493     {
00494         appItem_->setParentItem(this);
00495         appItem_->setPos(appPlaceholder_->pos());
00496     }
00497 
00498     emit contentChanged();
00499 }

00509 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00510 // Function: updateComponent()
00511 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00512 void ProgramEntityItem::updateComponent()
00513 {
00514     SWComponentItem::updateComponent();
00515 
00516     VLNV* vlnv = componentModel()->getVlnv();
00517 
00518     // Check whether the component is packaged (valid vlnv) or not.
00519     if (vlnv->isValid())
00520     {
00521         setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0xce,0xdf,0xff)));
00522     }
00523     else
00524     {
00525         setBrush(QBrush(QColor(217, 217, 217)));
00526     }
00527 
00528     // Show an icon if this is an imported SW component.
00529     if (isImported())
00530     {
00531         if (importedIcon_ == 0)
00532         {
00533             importedIcon_ = new QGraphicsPixmapItem(QPixmap(":icons/graphics/imported.png"), this);
00534             importedIcon_->setToolTip(tr("Auto-synced"));
00535 
00536             importedIcon_->setPos(100, 6);
00537         }
00538     }
00539     else if (importedIcon_ != 0)
00540     {
00541         delete importedIcon_;
00542     }
00543 }

00564 EndpointItem* ProgramEntityItem::getEndpoint(QString const& name)

00570             return item;
00571         }
00572     }
00573 
00574     return 0;
